select SALES_SER_NAME, SALES_BD_NAME, MIN(DECODE(SALES_BUNGI_CODE, 2, SALES_STORE_COUNT)) FIRST, MIN(DECODE(SALES_BUNGI_CODE, 4, SALES_STORE_COUNT)) SECOND, MIN(DECODE(SALES_BUNGI_CODE, 2, SALES_STORE_COUNT))- MIN(DECODE(SALES_BUNGI_CODE, 4, SALES_STORE_COUNT)) STORE
from SALES_TEMP_CSCODE where SALES_BD_NAME = #{area2} and SALES_CS_CODE like '%'||#{upjong}|| '%' and SALES_CS_CODE like '%'||#{detailupjong} || '%' and SALES_BUNGI_CODE IN ( 2, 4) GROUP BY SALES_SER_NAME, SALES_BD_NAME
